tool_description: The API powered by PropMix provides Public Record data of a Property
name: Public Record
title: Public Record

api_list.name: GetPropertyDetails
api_list.description: Returns the Public Record Details of the given property

required_parameters.name: OrderId
required_parameters.description: Alpha numeric combinations to uniquely reference an order

required_parameters.name: City
required_parameters.description: City of the address to be searched

required_parameters.name: PostalCode
required_parameters.description: PostalCode of the address to be searched

required_parameters.name: State
required_parameters.description: State of the address to be searched
